title: Edinburgh/South
name: Dalkeith Country Park
directions: Take Lothian Buses 3, 33 or 49 from Edinburgh to Dalkeith
hours: Easter to the end of September: 9:00-17:00 daily
content: A vast park next to Dalkeith. Great for outdoor activities such as cycling, walking, hiking, etc. One entrance point is at the north-east end of Dalkeith High Street.
